name: ShareListener
description: A simple app that registers itself as a Browser. When opened, the link is then shared and can be opened with any apps that listen for the share intent.  Useful for apps that dont have a share functionality but allow users to click on links.  Requested on /r/android: http://www.reddit.com/r/Android/comments/185aul/is_there_an_app_that_registers_itself_as_a/
